itunes:title: Episode 682 - Let It Burn!
title: Episode 682 - Let It Burn!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Veteran business owner Jason Murff of “Grill Your Ass Off” fame on a drunken Friday afternoon hours before the “Drinkin’ Bros Vs Drinkin’ Broettes 1st Annual Cook-Off” to rap about life, the fir...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Veteran business owner Jason Murff of “Grill Your Ass Off” fame on a drunken Friday afternoon hours before the “Drinkin’ Bros Vs Drinkin’ Broettes 1st Annual Cook-Off” to rap about life, the first presidential debate coming up, and how to properly burn down a car and get away with it.
